articles.title: Baltics fear Russia's Belarus presence and Suwalki Gap vulnerability - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Baltics and some Eastern European countries fear that the deployments could become permanent, redrawing the strategic map of Europe.
articles.content: Between 20,000 and 30,000 Russian troops along with warplanes, missile batteries and air defense systems have moved into Belarus in recent weeks, officially to participate in a military exercise, acc… [+4956 chars]

articles.author: Rick Noack, Loveday Morris, Karla Adam
articles.title: Can Macron, Scholz and Johnson stop Putin from invading Ukraine? - The Washington Post
articles.description: Macron, Johnson and Scholz share the same overarching goal: to stop a looming ground war against Russia on the European continent.
articles.content: Macron, Johnson and Scholz are trying to prove themselves on the world stage and send specific signals to their domestic constituents. But they also share the same overarching goal: to stop a looming… [+9432 chars]

articles.title: Astronomers have detected a new planet four light-years away from the Sun - Carlow Live
articles.description: Astronomers have detected a new planet around the star closest to the Sun. Using the European Southern Observatory’s Very Large Telescope (ESO’s VLT) in Chile, they found evidence of the body orbiting Proxima Centauri. The candidate planet is the third detect…
